snippet: The roof of a resort’s auditorium collapsed during an orientation ceremony for university freshmen in southeastern South Korea, officials said Tuesday.
abstract: Officials say the roof of Manua Ocean Resort auditorium in Gyeongju collapsed during an orientation ceremony for university freshmen in southeastern South Korea, killing at least 10 people.
lead_paragraph: The roof of a resort’s auditorium collapsed during an orientation ceremony for university freshmen in southeastern South Korea, officials said Tuesday.

headline.main: South Korea: At Least 10 Die as Resort’s Roof Collapses
headline.print_headline: South Korea: At Least 10 Die as Resort’s Roof Collapses
